text: The list of ship decommissionings in 1902 includes a chronological list of ships decommissioned in 1902. In cases where no official decommissioning ceremony was held, the date of withdrawal from service may be used instead. For ships lost at sea, see list of shipwrecks in 1902 instead. __NOTOC__ {| class="wikitable nowraplinks sortable" !style="text-align: left;"|Date !style="text-align: left;"|Operator !style="text-align: left;"|Ship !style="text-align: left;"|Class and type !style="text-align: left;"|Fate and other notes |----- | September 4 | | '''''' | collier | decommissioned at New York Navy Yard until recommissioned in 1903 |} == References == == See also == 1902 Ship decommissionings Ship decommissionings Ship decommissionings
title: List of ship decommissionings in 1902
